=== Summary ===

What to do with the Kubuntu Council.

=== Rationale ===

Council has been running for a year, we should look at how to keep it effective.

=== Design ===

Change half of the six members on an annual basis starting this May.

New members will be voted in at a meeting.

Hold meetings regularly each month at a regular date and time to be decided at the next meeting.
